title: My account suspended for no reason?
body: I Try to login and i get the message " This account has been permanently suspended , please check the email address  associated with your league of legends accounts for additional details" okay thats fine i check my email and there is nothing there?? so can someone please help me out?

replies.body: Yes i checked my Spam folder and nothing and will submit a ticket now thank you.

Have you tried checking your spam folder?

If you still can't find the email,[ try submitting a support ticket.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) They may take a little while to get back to you but they'll be able to tell you why your account has been suspended.
